# <a name="adding-emojis-to-email-messages"></a><span data-ttu-id="38fb2-102">Emojis įtraukimas į el. laiškus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38fb2-102">Adding emojis to email messages</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="38fb2-103">Galite įterpti emojis į savo pranešimus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38fb2-103">You can insert emojis in your messages.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="38fb2-104">Atsakykite ç esam± el. lai¹k± arba pasirinkite **Naujas prane¹imas**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38fb2-104">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="38fb2-105">Pasirinkite mygtuką **Įterpti emojis**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38fb2-105">Select the **Insert emojis** button</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="38fb2-106">, kad atidarytumėte sritį Išraiškos, apačioje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38fb2-106">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="38fb2-107">Ieškokite ir pasirinkite jaustukus arba GIF, kuriuos norite įterpti.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="38fb2-107">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>
